title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Deep Learning-Based Acoustic Absorption Structure Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational acoustics knowledge, intermediate-level machine learning comprehension, and familiarity with metamaterials
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Design and implementation of a deep learning model for mapping between structural parameters and sound absorption coefficient curves
Broadband sound-absorbing structure optimization using reverse design techniques
Multi-objective optimization (lightweight vs. sound absorption performance) project applying the NSGA-II algorithm
Validation of sound absorption characteristic prediction model with accuracy below MSE 0.0001
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
